module.name: Gateway
module.changelog: *17.0.10* Update and removing some stuffs. *17.0.9* Ready for GPL3. *17.0.8* Fixe issue showing wrong data when we are adding a gateway. *17.0.7* Fixe issue clearing json locales. *17.0.6* enable repos. *17.0.5* Translate JS i18n words. Fixe some bugs. *17.0.4* improving dialplan and fixe some regex bugs. *17.0.3* change dialplan. *17.0.2* fix some bugs. *17.0.1* Initial release.
module.description: Allow any extensions to be used as a gateway connected via a SIP trunk to another FreePBX server or Gateway.
